tool_description:
You like lottery? But you don't like to pick numbers each time?if your answers of these questions are both 'yes'. Try this!
New York Lottery Picker could help you to query the numbers, do not waste time to think which number is better, just let machine do that! You will have more time to do other things!
name: New York Lottery Picker
title: New York Lottery Picker

api_list.name: Statistics from users' choices

required_parameters.name: type
required_parameters.description: 'type' is the statistic type you want to query. Now only supports two: 'take5max' and 'numbersmax'. Also provide the real result from NY Lottery for each day. You can setup 'type' as "take5max_real" or "numbersmax_real" to query the numbers which win most times, it is being updated everyday

api_list.name: NY lottery picker

required_parameters.name: category
required_parameters.description: category of ny lottery, ex. take5

required_parameters.name: param1
required_parameters.description: parameter, ex, in "take 5", this parameter can be 5 as the round number
